plot: Once you've butchered your first lodger, eating meat 3 times a day can get dull. How can Dave and Charlotte liven up mealtimes with only 7 pence?
title: Free Range
plot_es: Once you've butchered your first lodger, eating meat 3 times a day can get dull. How can Dave and Charlotte liven up mealtimes with only 7 pence?
plot_en: Once you've butchered your first lodger, eating meat 3 times a day can get dull. How can Dave and Charlotte liven up mealtimes with only 7 pence?
